plebbitDataPath.name: plebbitDataPath
plebbitDataPath.description: Path to plebbit data path where subplebbits and ipfs node are stored

plebbitApiPort.name: plebbitApiPort
plebbitApiPort.description: Specify Plebbit API port to listen on

ipfsApiPort.name: ipfsApiPort
ipfsApiPort.description: Specify the API port of the ipfs node to listen on

ipfsGatewayPort.name: ipfsGatewayPort
ipfsGatewayPort.description: Specify the gateway port of the ipfs node to listen on

address.name: address
address.summary: Address of the subplebbit. Can be used to retrieve an already existing subplebbit

signer.privateKey.name: signer.privateKey
signer.privateKey.summary: Private key (PEM) of the subplebbit signer that will be used to determine address (if address is not a domain). Only needed if you're creating a new subplebbit

database.connection.filename.name: database.connection.filename
database.connection.filename.summary: Path to the subplebbit sqlite file

pubsubTopic.name: pubsubTopic
pubsubTopic.summary: The string to publish to in the pubsub, a public key of the subplebbit owner's choice

suggested.secondaryColor.name: suggested.secondaryColor
suggested.secondaryColor.summary: Secondary color of the subplebbit in hex

suggested.avatarUrl.name: suggested.avatarUrl
suggested.avatarUrl.summary: The URL of the subplebbit's avatar

suggested.bannerUrl.name: suggested.bannerUrl
suggested.bannerUrl.summary: The URL of the subplebbit's banner

suggested.backgroundUrl.name: suggested.backgroundUrl
suggested.backgroundUrl.summary: The URL of the subplebbit's background

settings.fetchThumbnailUrls.name: settings.fetchThumbnailUrls
settings.fetchThumbnailUrls.summary: Fetch the thumbnail URLs of comments comment.link property, could reveal the IP address of the subplebbit node

settings.fetchThumbnailUrlsProxyUrl.name: settings.fetchThumbnailUrlsProxyUrl
settings.fetchThumbnailUrlsProxyUrl.summary: The HTTP proxy URL used to fetch thumbnail URLs

sort.name: sort
sort.description: property to sort by (prepend '-' for descending)

filter.name: filter
filter.description: filter property by partial string matching, ex: name=foo

output.name: output
output.description: output in a more machine friendly format

no-truncate.name: no-truncate
no-truncate.description: do not truncate output to fit screen

args.name: addresses
args.description: Addresses of subplebbits to start. Separated by space
